title: Scale AI Loses to Smaller Startup in Bid for US Intel Work
description: An AI startup has won a seven-year contract to supply data labeling for artificial intelligence and machine learning for the US Department of Defense and intelligence community, beating out a larger rival, Scale AI Inc.
content:

title: AI technology could transform the grocery shopping experience
description: From the store to the kitchen, grocery shopping is part of everyone’s experience. Now, artificial intelligence could become part of that routine for shoppers.
content:
Richmond, Va. (InvestigateTV) — Kimberly Roberts has turned grocery-store savings into a lifestyle.

title: Alphabet races toward $4 trillion valuation as AI-fueled gains accelerate
description: (Reuters) -Alphabet closed in on a $4 trillion valuation on Monday, set to become only the fourth company to enter the exclusive club, as the Google parent rides an artificial intelligence-driven rally.
content:

description: (Reuters) -Amazon.com said on Monday it would invest up to $50 billion to expand artificial intelligence and supercomputing capacity for U.S. government customers, in one of the largest cloud infrastructure commitments targeted at the public sector.

title: Amazon pledges up to $50 billion to expand AI, supercomputing for US government
description: Amazon.com said on Monday it would invest up to $50 billion to expand artificial intelligence and supercomputing capacity for U.S. government customers, in one of the largest cloud infrastructure commitments targeted at the public sector.
content: The project, expected to break ground in 2026, will add nearly 1.3 gigawatts of new AI and high-performance computing capacity across AWS Top Secret, AWS Secret and AWS GovCloud regions through new data centers equipped with advanced compute and netw... [735 chars]
